mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*), TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') FROM ORDERS WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{nowMonth} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT SETT.SETTLE_DATE "CONFIRMDATE_BUY" , O.ORDER_DATE "ORDER_DATE" , O.ORDER_NO "ORDER_NO" , P.PRODUCT_NAME "PRODUCT_NAME" , S.SELLER_NAME "SELLER_NAME" , CON.CON_NAME "CON_NAME" , O.ORDER_PRICE "ORDER_PRICE" , NVL(C_STO.COUPON_PRICE, 0) "STORE_COUPON_PRICE" , NVL(C_KEY.COUPON_PRICE, 0) "KEYBOARDER_COUPON_PRICE" , PAY.PAYMENT_BILL "PAYMENT_BILL" , CASE WHEN C_STO.COUPON_PRICE IS NOT NULL THEN PAY.PAYMENT_BILL * 0.15 WHEN C_KEY.COUPON_PRICE IS NOT NULL THEN PAY.PAYMENT_BILL * 0.15 - C_KEY.COUPON_PRICE ELSE PAY.PAYMENT_BILL * 0.15 END "COMMISSION" , TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') "MONTH" FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN CONSUMER CON ON (CON.CON_NO = O.CON_NO) JOIN PAYMENT PAY ON (PAY.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) JOIN SETTLEMENT SETT ON (SETT.PAYMENT_NO = PAY.PAYMENT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) LEFT JOIN STORE_USE STO_U ON (STO_U.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON_STORE C_STO ON (C_STO.COUPON_NO = STO_U.COUPON_NO) LEFT JOIN KEYBOARDER_USE KEY_U ON (KEY_U.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN COUPON_KEYBOARDER C_KEY ON (C_KEY.COUPON_NO = KEY_U.COUPON_NO) ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC) A WHERE A.MONTH = #{nowMonth}
